title: Silver Scrub looking for duo
body:
Hi,
Silver scrub looking for duos to chill and play with. Not going to lie, i do tilt a bit and have a hard time carrying games, but I don't give up on games!

replies.body:
hey man I actually played against u in a ranked game. I was lucian and went like 11-4 but then u were leblanc and smashed the talon on my team and got like 20 kills....

so yea I lost that game. maybe we can duo. 

add me
Hey you still wanna duo? I don't usually use mic though but I'm looking to reach gold 4 before the season ends
